sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './App.css' import { io } from 'socket.io-client' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import Stats from './stats' const socket = io.connect("http://localhost:3001") function UserContent() { const location = useLocation() const [player, setPlayer] = useState("") const [team, setTeam] = useState("") const [c_team, setCTeam] = useState("") const [c_amount, setCAmount] = useState(0) const [basePrice, setBasePrice] = useState(0) let bp const handleBid = () => { setBasePrice(basePrice) console.log(basePrice); setCAmount(c_amount) setCTeam(team) console.log("After " + c_amount); socket.emit("handle_bid", { team, amount: c_amount, basePrice }) } useEffect(() => { socket.emit("req_player") socket.on("requested_player", (data) => { // console.log("hey "+data.player); setPlayer(data.player) setTeam(location.state) setCAmount(0) setBasePrice(Number(data.player["Base_Price_Lakhs"])) }) socket.on("sold_success", (data) => { alert(`Player sold to ${data.cur_team}`) setCTeam("-") }) socket.on("reply_handle_bid", (data) => { setCTeam(data.team) setCAmount(data.amount) console.log(c_amount); }) }, [socket]) return (

User Content

Timer: 00:00

Player Name: {player["First_Name"] + " " + player["Surname"]}

Player Stats

{/*

Stats: Stats Here

*/}

Auction Details

Base Price:

Current Bid: |

Slots Players Over.
Batsman 5 2
Bowler 7 3
All Rounder 4 2
WK 2 1
) } export default UserContent
